tool_description: An API showing Cyber Security Around the World
name: Cyber Security News
title: Cyber Security News

api_list.name: This will get Cy ber Security News From Specific New Outlet
api_list.description:
News outlets we have currently are 

1. cnbc
2. wired
3. threatpost
4. bbc
5. reuters
6. latimes
7. smh
8. un
9. es
10. nyp
11. wsj
12. thn
13. guardian
14. abc
15. cyberinsiders

**Some news outlets will not show any response because if no new news**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cyber-security-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/latimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cyber-security-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cyber-security-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cyber-security-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Cyber Security News
api_list.description: This will show all Cyber Security News from around the world
